DOC.brief_summary: Use of Juice Plus+ food supplements, when initiated in the first trimester and used continuously thereafter, will result in a lower incidence of preeclampsia and pregnancy complications. This is a prospective randomized and blinded placebo controlled study sponsored by NSA, LLC of Memphis, TN.
DOC.brief_title: Early Pregnancy Antioxidant Supplementation in the Prevention of Preeclampsia
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Patients seen in first trimester with low or high risk pregnancy Pregnant patients first seen after the first trimester Unlikely to continue care in our system Unwilling to comply with rigor of taking food supplements throughout gestation
